title: Co-Parenting Competency Enhancement Program for Prospective Parents

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic parenting concepts and foundational awareness as prospective parents
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environment blending online and offline sessions for working learners with time constraints, utilizing collaborative tools in a BYOD setting

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain core principles of co-parenting (e.g., role distribution, communication strategies) with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners will evaluate their ability to resolve conflicts and develop parenting plans through at least three practical simulations.
Learners will create a project-based, actionable parenting agreement and incorporate peer and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
